abstract: Vista sales are crashing, but Microsoft has a lot of cash for acquisitions. Meanwhile, Yahoo wants to build a little house on the prairie.
snippet: Vista sales are crashing, but Microsoft has a lot of cash for acquisitions. Meanwhile, Yahoo wants to build a little house on the prairie.
lead_paragraph: At Least Microsoft Is Doing Better Than Yahoo

headline.main: Quick Bits: Microsoft Prowls While Yahoo Mingles With Prairie Dogs

abstract: The mix of Windows sales had tipped more toward low-cost PCs, which come with lower-margin versions of Windows and often not Vista.
snippet: The mix of Windows sales had tipped more toward low-cost PCs, which come with lower-margin versions of Windows and often not Vista.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft reported a reassuringly solid quarter in tough times on Thursday, but its Windows business looked weak.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Vista Problem, by the Numbers
